TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeviceInformation extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsAttachedToEnclosure = unsigned int32(4096)

Docs.summary: The hub port to which the USB device is connected has a USB connector on the enclosure

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsAttachedToRootHubMask = unsigned int32(2)

Docs.summary: The USB device is directly attached to the root hub

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsCaptive = unsigned int32(1)

Docs.summary: The USB device is directly attached to its hub and cannot be removed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsConnected = unsigned int32(8)

Docs.summary: The USB device is connected to its hub

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsEnabled = unsigned int32(16)

Docs.summary: The hub port to which the USB device is attached is enabled

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsInReset = unsigned int32(64)

Docs.summary: The hub port to which the USB device is attached is being reset

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsInternal = unsigned int32(4)

Docs.summary: The USB device is internal to the enclosure (all the hubs it attaches to are captive)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsOnThunderbolt = unsigned int32(8192)

Docs.summary: The USB device is downstream of a controller that is attached through Thunderbolt

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsRemote = unsigned int32(2048)

Docs.summary: This device is "attached" to the controller through a remote connection

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsRootHub = unsigned int32(512)

Docs.summary: The device is the root hub simulation

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation IsSuspended = unsigned int32(32)

Docs.summary: The hub port to which the USB device is attached is suspended

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation Overcurrent = unsigned int32(128)

Docs.summary: The USB device generated an overcurrent

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation PortIsInTestMode = unsigned int32(256)

Docs.summary: The hub port to which the USB device is attached is in test mode

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.DeviceInformation RootHubIsBuiltIn = unsigned int32(1024)

Docs.summary: If this is a root hub simulation and it's built into the enclosure, this bit is set. If it's on an expansion card, it will be cleared
